alert.note: Alert for Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 2:25PM EDT until July 12 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Essex County in northern New York... Southwestern Addison County in central Vermont... Northern Rutland County in southern Vermont... Northwestern Windsor County in southern Vermont... * Until 315 PM EDT. * At 225 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Benson Landing, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Rutland, Castleton, West Castleton, Sudbury, Hubbardton, Killington, Orwell, Stockbridge, Proctor, Benson, Brandon, Chittenden, Mendon, Pittsfield, Pittsford, West Haven, Fair Haven, West Rutland, Rutland City and Goshen. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Boaters on Lake Champlain should seek safe harbor now! Strong winds will cause higher waves and sudden wind shifts may overturn boats. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
